name: Electromania
description:
Electromania

By Team: Volta VI, Niagara College
Developers: Ronald Hinh, Nero, Austin Antle, Mark Kolpak, Geoffery Barton, Kaz (Music)

Play as a repair-bot named Rivet to bring power back to the generators of a post-apocalyptic world and restore life. Use his electro-dash to interact with the objects but beware of hostile robots, industrial hazards and water!
